diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $QV$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $RT$ is $3$ units.
The length of the line $ST$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $VS$ is $x$ units.
Point $T$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $V$.
Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $S$ and $Q$.
The line connecting $Q$ and $V$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $T$ and $V$.
The line connecting $R$ and $T$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $S$ and $T$.
